issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports protecting and expanding the Affordable Care Act, lowering prescription drug prices, and ensuring coverage for pre-existing conditions

issues.title: Economic Development
issues.description: Advocates for small business support, workforce training, and creating jobs through infrastructure investment

issues.title: Education
issues.description: Supports increased funding for public education, reducing student debt, and expanding vocational training programs

issues.title: Climate Change
issues.description: Supports green energy initiatives, reducing carbon emissions, and investing in renewable energy infrastructure

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with a path to citizenship and border security improvements

issues.title: Gun Safety
issues.description: Advocates for universal background checks, assault weapons ban, and closing gun show loopholes

issues.title: Women's Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of reproductive rights, equal pay, and workplace protections for women

issues.title: Foreign Policy
issues.description: Supports strong international alliances, diplomatic engagement, and strategic military preparedness
